document_data.name: Gorstaf
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gorstaf''' was a [[duergar]] baker, who specialized in [[fungus]] pies, from the [[Gracklstugh]] in the [[Underdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''All manner of baked goods, but pies are our specialty. Mostly fungus pies. [[Bluecap]], [[ripplebark]], or maybe [[myconid]] if you feel like taking your health in your hands.''|Gorstaf}}
document_data.Description: Gorstaf was a duergar man with obsidian black skin. He had a long bushy white beard and wore a [[chef's toque]] and was armed with a menacing-looking oversized [[spoon]].
document_data.Activities: Gorstaf's bakey was located in the [[Darklake]] district of Gracklstugh, an odd place for a bakery due to the district's size and population. Gorstaf's menu included [[bluecap pie]]s, [[ripplebark pie]]s, and [[myconid pie]]s, among others.
